org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.writer

接口 ChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • 类型参数:
    T - the type of record which is sent through the attached output gate
    所有已知实现类:
    BroadcastPartitioner, CustomPartitionerWrapper, ForwardPartitioner, GlobalPartitioner, KeyGroupStreamPartitioner, OutputEmitter, RebalancePartitioner, RescalePartitioner, RoundRobinChannelSelector, ShufflePartitioner, StreamPartitioner

    public interface ChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    The ChannelSelector determines to which logical channels a record should be written to.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int[] selectChannels(T record, int numChannels)
      Returns the logical channel indexes, to which the given record should be written.

    • 方法详细资料

      • selectChannels

        int[] selectChannels(T record,
                     int numChannels)
        Returns the logical channel indexes, to which the given record should be written.
        参数:
        record - the record to the determine the output channels for
        numChannels - the total number of output channels which are attached to respective output gate
        返回:
        a (possibly empty) array of integer numbers which indicate the indices of the output channels through which the record shall be forwarded
